genericEnd.title: Interested in doing a project together?

home.title: Hey, I'm Alex Spencer and I love building beautiful websites
home.subtitle: About Me
home.description: I am a junior front-end developer looking for a new role in an exciting company. I focus on writing HTML as semantic as possible, using CSS practices and writing clean JavaScript. When writing JavaScript code, I mainly use React, but I can adapt to any tool required. Right now I'm based in Madrid, Spain, but I come from a small town in Córdoba, Argentina. When I'm not coding, you'll find me learning some new technology, looking for ways to improve the ones I know, but I also enjoy exploring new places, either inside or outside the city. My future plans involve learning more about front-end development and learning about back-end so I can create more complex solutions when needed.

portolio.name: Studio 51
portolio.description: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.

portolio.name: Calculator
portolio.description: This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS Grid and JavaScript for the areas that required interactivity, such as the testimonial slider.

portolio.name: NFT Card
portolio.description: This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS Grid and JavaScript for the areas that required interactivity, such as the features section.

portolio.name: Ecommerce App
portolio.description: This was a small project which mostly consisted of HTML and CSS. I built a fully-responsive landing page. The only JavaScript this project required was to enable the toggling of the mobile navigation.

portolio.name: Fylo
portolio.description: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.

portolio.name: Movie App
portolio.description: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.

contact.description: I would love to know what you are working on and how I could help you. I am currently looking for a new position and am open to a wide range of opportunities. My preference would be to find a position at a company with remote work. But I am also willing to listen to opportunities that do not fit that description. I am a hardworking and positive person who will always approach every task with a sense of purpose and attention to detail. Please feel free to review my online profiles below and get in touch using the form.

intro.name: Fylo
intro.description: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.

projectDescription.title: Project Background
projectDescription.description: This project was a front-end  challenge from Frontend Mentor. It's a platform that enables you to practice building websites to a design and project brief. Each challenge includes mobile and desktop designs to show how the website should look at different screen sizes. Creating these projects has helped me refine my workflow and solve real-world coding problems. I've learned something new with each project, helping me to improve and adapt my style.
projectDescription.subtitle: Static Previews

home.title: Hola, soy Ezequiel Alarcon y me encanta crear paginas web
home.subtitle: Sobre Mi
home.description: Soy un desarrollador front-end junior que busca un nuevo papel en una empresa emocionante. Me enfoco en escribir HTML lo más semántico posible, usando prácticas de CSS y escribiendo JavaScript limpio. Cuando escribo código JavaScript, principalmente utilizo React, pero puedo adaptarme a cualquier herramienta que se requiera. Ahora mismo estoy radicado en Madrid, España, pero provengo de una pequeña ciudad en Córdoba, Argentina. Cuando no estoy codificando, me encontraras aprendiendo alguna nueva tecnología, buscando maneras de mejorar aquellas que conozco, pero también disfruto de explorar lugares nuevos, ya sean dentro o fuera de la ciudad.Mis planes a futuro involucran conocer más del desarrollo front-end y aprender sobre back-end para poder crear soluciones más complejas cuando sean necesarias.

contact.description: Me encantaría saber en qué estás trabajando y cómo podría ayudarte. Actualmente, estoy buscando un nuevo puesto y estoy abierto a una amplia gama de oportunidades. Mi preferencia sería encontrar un puesto en una empresa con trabajo remoto. Pero también estoy dispuesto a escuchar oportunidades que no se ajusten a esa descripción. Soy una persona trabajadora y positiva que siempre abordará cada tarea con un sentido de propósito y atención al detalle. Por favor, siéntase libre de revisar mis perfiles en línea a continuación y póngase en contacto utilizando el formulario.
